resources.string:
My name is Ilyas. 

I am a JavaScript full-stack developer. 

I've been programming since my childhood starting with C and C++. 

During my engineering studies at the School of Information Science, I had the chance to learn Java and Python.

 
To view some of my awesome projects, check the section below. 
 
I believe that programming is more than just writing code; 
It's more about problem-solving and design thinking.
 
My best learning technique is to reverse-engineer the best projects and learn from them step-by-step.
